reviewText: This came here in excellent condition and was here way sooner than i ever expected. But the kids grow weary of watching this after the first time

I am so glad that I bought this movie for my 2 year old son. It has like 6 shows in one and my son LOVES it. He loves to sing the songs when the tools are getting ready and fixing. He loves to immitate the hammer with his own head. It is just a fantastic joy for him.
I purchased this Handy Manny video for my son's 4th birthday and he just loves it. They say it in spanish, than in english.thank-you.

I and the little one love this show, but I was very disappointed when I set it to play all episodes and it played advertising to for other products before and between each program.

Love Manny, Not sure about Disney.
The kids loved this video, they have watched it many times.  I'll be buying more of these.
if your kids loves handy manny and can't get enough this is great, they are the same episodes as on tv but he will still watch them over and over, especially in long car rides!

Wonderful video for any child.  My son loves "fixing" things with his plastic tools and Handy Manny is just perfect.  It teaches them about working together to get things done and also working together with everyone in the community.
Thank you for the prompt delivery and it was in great condition.  My grandson loves it!  Thanks!
this is such a cute and educational show.  it teaches young ones how to share and how to work together.  it also teaches kids how to be patient.
My four year old LOVES Handy Manny...so this DVD has been quite the hit. With free shipping over $25...you can not go wrong.
Bought this for my nephew in Germany.  He really loved it!!!
Grandson will have fun watching
World's worst phone case. I didn't notice it was broke before I put it on but when I went to take it off I nearly broke my phone in half and the case broke even more.

This was a great price and arrived sealed in plastic. My daughter has recently become obsessed with Handy Manny, so this is perfect for her.
My son loves handy manny. he sits for hours. Great dvd. Came quickly will order another.
Love them, my son is hooked on handy manny. Waiting onto getting some more.
what's not to love about Handy. Engaging.  Multicultural like the real world!  Gender balanced; also shows people with different physical abilities.  My daughter loves it.
Grandchildren learning a little Spanish on their own from these DVD,s
Grandson LOVES MANNY

It's fun and interesting for my kids to watch.  I love that there is a show that is treaching them how to use tools.  that is something I think is important and instilling it in kids early is brilliant.  Obviously the show isn't making anyone a carpenter but it is giving kids an introduction into something that really is a life skill.

My grandson loves Manny and the talking tools and I have to admit I do too. However I did not realize there are several ads for other Disney on the DVD before you get to Manny. I simply fast-forwarded but was slightly annoyed. Still would recommend this series.
My 4 year old son loves watching Handy Manny and he loves watching this movie. It is new as described.

my son loves handy manny!  he has watched all the episodes on netflix and enjoy manny and the tools so much.  we haven't watched the dvd yet as we only watch on netflix at our house, but i got this so he can watch manny while at his granny and papa's house too.  i'm sure it will be great!

My two and a half year old found Handy Manny via the local library....borrowed it so many times I decided to order it. Fantastic Amazon price and shipping. Has several episodes and previews and two months later we are still watching it over and over!
They  were for my sons and they loved the movies. Thanks totally satisfied. The price was a fair price too.
My little one loves it, it got here in 2 days, and was in perfect condition! I would recommend this to anyone who has a Handy Manny loving little one in the house!

if your youngster enjoys this cute character than this movie is for you!!! My son loves to see him fix everything and it is perfect in length.  The running time is perfect for a toddler to sit and watch.  Not to long!

Kids Love this. Great Stories and keeps them active.
Much better than most of the TV shows out there.
Keeps them entertained and actually teaches good stuff too.
Recommend.
My nephews love Handy Manny and his tools. This was a gift and they watch as often as there mother will let them.

Handy Manny: Fixing It Right is a 2008 Disney DVD compilation of five mini-sodes of the popular Disney Junior original series Handy Manny. In this DVD, Manny Garcia(Wilmer Valderrama, That 70's Show)and his team of magical talking tools travel around Sheetrock Hills helping out their neighbours by fixing and repairing everything. The DVD also has special features like a Spanish language track, and sneak peeks of other Disney favourites like Little Einsteins: Flight Of The Instrument Fairies, Johnny and The Sprites, My Friends Tigger and Pooh: Friendly Tails and Handy Manny: Manny's Pet Round Up. This Disney Junior DVD is perfect for anyone who likes to learn Spanish and helping learn how to work together!
We always enjoy watching Handy Manny with our kids. We are planning to get the new one that was just released.
I purchased this as a gift for my great nephew and he loves it!!! Says he is learning how to build a house lol.  Would recommend this product to anyone that has a child with an active imagination.
My grand kids really like this dvd. They usually ask to see this one whenever they come over. They are 2, 4, 4, and 5. I would recommend this to any children.
Daugher loves Handy Manny and the tools.  She wanted some DVD's for the car so this was the fix we needed.

Handy Manny is the only tv that my 17 month son wants to watch. (That is a good thing!) The animination is good and he can pick up a few Spanish words too! Too bad Disney no longer runs Handy Manny. This DVD is great and has 5 episodes.
Funciono apenas lo ingrese a mi car sound system. A mi hijo le encanta ver a Manny. A mi tambien me gusta porque le ensea valores y otro idioma...comprelo...

This video has several episodes (kitty in tree, bowling alley, etc)

Handy Manny is a great show that adds learning and humor all at the same time. You can't find it on TV anymore and Netflix removed it from their line up a couple weeks ago; my son was pretty upset. I jumped onto Amazon and bought 4 Handy Manny DVD's and they have worked out well so far.
Great product
